msg: A patch from Arpit Singh Pandya "Error is not Handle for Inventory, if wrong productId is passed, it is breaking the ftl." (https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-3265) - OFBIZ-3265

It is breaking the ProductInventorySummary.ftl and EditProductInventoryItems.ftl code.
